Reviews.Title: so impressed
Reviews.Author: Librarian "TMD"
Reviews.Content: This is by far the BEST phone I have EVER owned!  I had the iphone 3 and wanted something different.  I put a 32GB SD card in it and can not wait to load music onto it.  The only thing that is inferior is the camera.  Its only 2 mega pixel.  But its a phone not a camera and the images are decent.  EVERYTHING about this phone is cute!  The icons, the alerts.  I am thinking of buying another one for back-up in case I lose this or break it because I can not live without it!!!!!!!!  I am soooo happy!

Reviews.Title: cute phone but
Reviews.Author: Shell Griggs
Reviews.Content: Not compatible with some apps. Other than that this phone has worked greatI would recommend this phone for a tern girl.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Galen
Reviews.Content: Positives: Very nicely crafted limited edition Samsung phone with the Hello Kitty buttons and extra wallpaper and ring tones.  Arrived in nice packaging and shipped on time.Cons: Loads a bit slow, but was expected since this is an older phone.  Very brief start up instructions for phone and not as detailed.  People with no experience with smartphones might have some issues getting used to the phone.Overall, not a bad phone, would order again from seller!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product!!!!!
Reviews.Author: DaughterPleaser
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughters birthday and she loves it.She can take pics,text,email,play games and more .She says if she could turn back time she would  thank the makers of this product.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: careyann
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my 13yr old daughter and she love so much.  she likes all the  apps and the android capability.  I never regret buying this phone. I like it

Reviews.Title: cuuuuuute
Reviews.Author: Colleen
Reviews.Content: IT IS SO CUTE IT HURTS AH. hello kitty music plays on it when it turns on and the buttons are kitty and the back is kitty and its absolutly adorable. also it is running gingerbread and most apps work great on it, and it has a radio, which I didn't expect, but I use it all the time.

Reviews.Title: Memory problems
Reviews.Author: Arlette Paredes
Reviews.Content: The memory is almost full or full all the time... I have no more than 4 apps downloaded and the only app they allowed me to put in my sd card was skype.Besides that, the phone works.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: The phone is cute. When you get these things your posting for a name. Even hooked up to my WiFi the phone reacts slowly. Some apps you can't get on this phone. Camera us good, it does the job and I always get complimented for . My phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900MHz frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA 900/2100MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
2MP Camera with Geo-tagging; 3.0" TFT Capacitive Touchscreen, 256K colors, with TouchWiz UI and Touch sensitive controls; GPS with A-GPS support; Stereo FM radio with RDS; MicroSD Card Slot expendable up to 32GB; MP3 and MP4 Player and Social Networking.
Android OS, v2.3.5 (Gingerbread); CPU 830 MHz ARMv6; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Hotspot functionality; Bluetooth; Speed HSDPA, 7.2 Mbps; 3.5mm Audio Jack; Accelerometer, proximity and compass Sensors; Java MIDP 2.1 and Quickoffice document viewer.
Talk time Up to 17 h (2G)/Up to 6 h 20 min (3G)- Standby Up to 850 h (2G)/Up to 540 h (3G).
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-S5360 Galaxy Y Hello Kitty Unlocked 3G GSM Phone with Android OS - US Warranty - White
